original_text:
those who bow down on the roofs
    to the host of the heavens,
those who bow down and swear to the Lord
    and yet swear by Milcom,
korean_text: 또 지붕에서 하늘의 뭇 별에게 경배하는 자들과 경배하며 여호와께 맹세하면서 말감을 가리켜 맹세하는 자들과

sentences.original_text: those who bow down on the roofs
to the host of the heavens
those who bow down and swear to the Lord
